turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey could you order a drink for me from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Which Starbucks are you wanting to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on Tesson Ferry Road.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. Which drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or iced?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. What kind of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take 2%.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any flavors added to that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like a couple pumps of french vanilla.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like anything else added?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. So you want a grande hot black and white mocha with 2% milk, whipped cream, and a couple pumps of french vanilla?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes that sounds right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay your order has been put in and will be waiting for you.
